mapper.sql: pmc_id, pmc_name, pmc_amount, pmc_start, pmc_end, pmc_state, com_name, isva, optime, oper, sort
mapper.select: select count(dp.pmc_id) from drug_pmc dp,drug_pmc_details pd where dp.pmc_id = pd.pmc_id and dp.pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dp.isva = '1' and pd.isva = '1'
select count(dp.pmc_id) from drug_pmc dp,drug_audit da where dp.pmc_id = da.aud_fk_id and dp.pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dp.isva = '1' and da.isva = '1'
mapper.insert:
SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-','') AS id;
insert into drug_pmc
pmc_id,
pmc_name,
pmc_amount,
pmc_start,
pmc_end,
pmc_state,
com_name,
isva,
optime,
oper,
sort,

mapper.update:
update drug_pmc
pmc_name = #{pmcName,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pmc_amount = #{pmcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pmc_start = #{pmcStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pmc_end = #{pmcEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pmc_state = #{pmcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
com_name = #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update drug_pmc set pmc_name = #{pmcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pmc_amount = #{pmcAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pmc_start = #{pmcStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pmc_end = #{pmcEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pmc_state = #{pmcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, com_name = #{comName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isva = #{isva,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, optime = #{optime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where pmc_id = #{pmcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
